data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Jagatsinghapur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jagatsinghapur, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Jagatsinghapur, Odisha, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Jagatsinghapur, Odisha, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Jagatsinghapur to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Jagatsinghapur who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Jagatsinghapur, Odisha, India.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,137,000 people living in Jagatsinghapur through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Jagatsinghapur, Odisha, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
